#summary Build guide for example 30A EVSE

 
=Parts List=


*The following parts are available in the [http://openevse-store.myshopify.com/ OpenEVSE Store] *

<b><font color=red>Time Saver</font></b> - The [http://openevse-store.myshopify.com/collections/frontpage/products/openevse-30a-charge-station-combo 30A Charge Station Combo] avaliable in the [http://openevse-store.myshopify.com/ OpenEVSE Store] contains the parts to build this 30A Charge Station with the exception of the J1772 cable.

  * [http://openevse-store.myshopify.com/collections/frontpage/products/openevse-plus-v2 OpenEVSE Plus] (Built or Quick Kit)
  * OpenEVSE LCD (Built or Quick Kit)
  * Relay 1 x DPST or 2 x SPST
  * CR 8420-1000-G GFCI coil
  * 30A Fuse Block
  * 2 x 30A Fuses
  * Ground Block
  * 16mm momentary push button
  * AC cord
  * Cable Glands
  * Enclosure

<b><font color=red>Time Saver</font></b> - Pre-built OpenEVSE Plus boards are avaliable in the [http://openevse-store.myshopify.com/ OpenEVSE Store].

<b><font color=red>Time Saver</font></b> - Pre-Built OpenEVSE LCDs are avaliable in the [http://openevse-store.myshopify.com/ OpenEVSE Store].

*Avaliable in the [http://store.leviton.com/Electric-Vehicle-Charge-Connector-A3435-PEV/dp/B00912OT00?field_availability=-1&field_browse=5742800011&field_product_site_launch_date_utc=-1y&id=Electric+Vehicle+Charge+Connector+A3435-PEV&ie=UTF8&refinementHistory=brandtextbin%2Csubjectbin%2Ccolor_map%2Cprice%2Csize_name&searchNodeID=5742800011&searchPage=1&searchRank=salesrank&searchSize=12 Leviton Store]:*
  * 30A Leviton J1772 cordset/handle 
  
<b><font color=blue>Optional Parts:</font></b>
  * EV Simulator
  * ISP Programmer
  * Noise/Surge Kit

=References=
http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8212/8421959660_9e22cc662f_z.jpg

=Internal Mounting Plate=
In this step we will mount the Main EVSE components to the Internal Mounting plate of the Enclosure.

You will need:

  * OpenEVSE Plus - If you have not Assembled it yet please refer to this [OpenEVSE_Plus_spec Assembly Guide]
  * Relay(s)
  * 30A Fuse Block
  * Ground Block
  * Internal Mounting plate
  * 10 - 5/8# 4-40 screws
  * 4 - 4/40 locking nuts
  * 4 - 1/4" Quick Connect terminals
  * 4 - 1/4" Nylon Spacers
  * 18AWG - 20AWG wire 300V+

<b><font color=red>Time Saver</font></b> - Pre-crimped Quick Connect terminals are avaliable in the [http://openevse-store.myshopify.com/ OpenEVSE Store].

=Cover / LCD=

Next we will mount the LCD and buttonon the Front Plate.

You will need:

  * OpenEVSE LCD - If you have not Assembled it yet please refer to this [OpenEVSE_LCD_spec Assembly Guide]
  * 4 - 1/4" Nylon Spacers (included in LCD kit)
  * 4 pin connector (included in LCD kit)
  * 4 - 5/8# 4-40 screws
  * 16mm push button
  * 3 pin connector
  * Mounting plate

<b><font color=red>Time Saver</font></b> - A lit push button with pre-soldered 3-pin Connector is avaliable in the [http://openevse-store.myshopify.com/ OpenEVSE Store].
